string.value: #b#@1020000:##k in #b#m102000000##k has a favor to ask of you.

He says he needs #rLeaves#k to use in a traditional ceremony for his ancestors.
Eliminate #rDark Stumps#k and collect 20 #rLeaves#k.
#rDark Stumps#k can be found all throughout #b#m101030300##k and #b#m101030000##k.

Report back to #b#@1020000:##k in #b#m102000000##k upon completion.
You have eliminated #rDark Stumps#k and have collected #rLeaves#k for the traditional ceremony.
I must begin the traditional ceremony for our ancestors shortly, but I don't have enough #rLeaves#k for the ceremony. I don't have much time.\n\nOh, you look like an adventurer. Won't you help me?

You can acquire #rLeaves#k by hunting #rDark Stumps#k.
Please bring me about 20 of them.

You'll find #rDark Stumps#k widely spread out from #b#m101030300##k to #b#m101030000##k.
I know #rDark Stumps#k are strong, but please! Have some confidence in yourself!
That was quick. So, wasn't it difficult eliminating them? Those monsters have a very high defense rate. Haha! I feel safe knowing there are adventurers like you out there.
Thanks to your help, I can proceed with the traditional ceremony for our ancestors.\n\nTake care and see you around.
